comment: I loved the packaging. The pink syngonium plant that I got was infected. But because of separate packaging, the remaining plants are healthy. After I complained about the plant that was infected, they quickly sent me a second package with four healthy plants. It's been over a month now and all of the plants are well.
name: John Smith

comment: Some leaves are green and some leaves are greenish yellow but anyway it looks great!
name: Pro Rasel

comment: The customer service is excellent. One of the plants was delivered with leaves looking bit dull. They themselves took the initiative to deliver a new one free of cost. Tbey belive in customer satisfaction which I hold in high regards. Giveit a try and decorate your house or work place with lively plants and fresh ambiance.
name: Abu Sufian

comment: Value for money, sturdiness durability Very happy with this produc Minimal care required Easy to take care of it
name: Olivia

comment: The plants arrived on time and were in good condition. However, there was a small crack in one of the pots. On contacting the seller, they sent a replacement which arrived within 5 days. It's an excellent buy!
name: Benjamin

comment: Plants are very small and not as per picture shown. 2 plants are not in good condition Disappointed
name: Sergio
